hadiths.text: This tradition has been reported by 'Umar b. al-Khattab through a different chain of narrators. He narrated it to the same effect and that is more correct

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي اعْتِزَالِ النِّسَاءِ فِي الْمَسَاجِدِ عَنِ الرِّجَالِ
chapter.eng-name: Separating The Women From The Men In The Masjid
